channel.title: Page on Biblioteca Lascasiana
channel.description: Recent content in Page on Biblioteca Lascasiana

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the Biblioteca Lascasiana. Here you will find a growing digital library of the works of Bartolomé de Las Casas, his sources, and commentators. This is a project of the Bartolomé de Las Casas Society.
